metadata.title: CVE-2015-2782 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer overflow in Open-source ARJ archiver 3.10.22 allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code viaa crafted ARJ archive.

criterions.comment: arj: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
